text: German Molina Moreno (4 October 1933 - 8 January 2016), also known as Kuya Germs or the Master Showman, was a Filipino television host, actor, comedian and talent manager. He was most popular during the 1980s. He was known for formerly hosting GMA Supershow. Moreno was born in Santa Cruz, Manila, Philippines. He died in Quezon City, Philippines from cardiac arrest due to a stroke he had on 7 January 2016. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Actors from Manila Category:Filipino comedians Category:Filipino television presenters Category:Television producers
title: German Moreno
